timeline.bodyText: Is it worth documenting here or in a comment when one would use this instead of MergeVcfs? They do seem pretty different but the names are similar.
timeline.author: pshapiro4broad

replies.bodyText: Not sure if I want to address this in the documentation.  I'll add a comment.  MergeVcfs doesn't support the use case here.  Where we have multiple input VCFs each with a different sample name.  There used to be a tool in GATK 3 (not implemented in 4) called CombineVariants that did support this use case, but it merged duplicate sites, so we implemented this tool.
